attributes.action: Have Free Hospital Car Parking For Emergencies Admissions (for babies and children)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no emergency parking available at our local hospital for people needing emergency treatment. You have to pay in the main car park, which is usually full during weekdays with visitors, leaving you nowhere to park!
By driving to the hospital saves using the time and resources of the Ambulance service, saving the NHS money!!
There should be a parking area and system where the parking attendants communicate with A&E reception to see the customer’s situation before issuing tickets.
When you have the stress of taking a sick baby or child to A&E you should have total time for them not worrying whether you will receive a parking ticket.
